metadata.title: CVE-2018-18020 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In QPDF 8.2.1, in libqpdf/QPDFWriter.cc, QPDFWriter::unparseObject and QPDFWriter::unparseChild have recursive calls for a long time, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: qpdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.3.1-1').
